    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lom.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:aspect.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_52ec2d98de91cc9f4a3139f9f6e477f703f4d3f5</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>CUP</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_52ec2d98de91cc9f4a3139f9f6e477f703f4d3f5</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Current flow in rivers</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Aktueller Fluß in Flüsse</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Écoulement actuel dans les fleuves</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Fluxo atual nos rios</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Flusso corrente in fiumi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Παρούσα ροή στους ποταμούς</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Flujo actual en los ríos</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows a slow flowing river carrying small particles of sediments (top image) and a river in a flood (bottom image) carrying a lot of sediments because it flows fast.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">river</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">flood</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sediments</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt einen langsamen flüssigen 
Fluß, der Teilchen der Sedimente tragen (oberes Bild) und einen Fluß
in einer tragenden Menge der Flut (unteres Bild) Sedimente, weil sie 
schnell fließt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre un fleuve débordant 
lent portant de petites particules des sédiments (image supérieure) 
et un fleuve dans beaucoup portant d'inondation (image inférieure) de
sédiments parce qu'elle coule rapidement.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra um rio fluindo lento que
carregam partículas pequenas dos sedimentos (imagem superior) e um 
rio em uns muitos carregando da inundação (imagem inferior) dos 
sedimentos porque flui rapidamente.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra un fiume fluente 
lento che trasportano le piccole particelle dei sedimenti (immagine 
superiore) e un fiume in sedimenti molto trasportanti 
dell'inondazione (immagine inferiore) perché fluisce velocemente.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει έναν αργό ρέοντας 
ποταμό που φέρνουν τα μικρά μόρια των ιζημάτων (κορυφαία 
εικόνα) και έναν ποταμό σε μια πλημμύρα (κατώτατη εικόνα) που 
φέρνει πολλά ιζήματα επειδή ρέει γρήγορα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra un río que fluye lento
que lleva partículas pequeñas de los sedimentos (imagen superior) y 
un río en muchos que llevan de la inundación (imagen inferior) de 
sedimentos porque fluye rápidamente.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Fluß</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Flut</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sedimente</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">fleuve</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">inondation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">sédiments</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">rio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">inundação</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">sedimentos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">fiume</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">inondazione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">sedimenti</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ποταμός</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">πλημμύρα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ιζήματα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">río</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">inundación</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">sedimentos</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
